name: PROFESSIONAL WOMEN`S NETWORK ROMANIA
headAddress: Str. Baiculesti, nr. 23, bl. E9, sc. C, et. 8, ap. 113, sector 1, Bucuresti
goal:
The purpose of the Association is the professional advancement of women working in Romania. The Association also aims the following:

a) To encourage the sustainable progress of women in their career and in decision-making positions;
b) To create a national and international community that promotes best practice, collaborates on projects of common interest, provides networking, personal and professional development opportunities;
c) To provide mentoring programs;
d) To promote a gender diversity culture in business environment;
e) To promote UNESCO ideals by educational, cultural and scientific means;
f) To promote national and international intellectual cooperation, to develop and disseminate education, science and culture, according to UNESCO values.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Enterprise, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives: Gender balance among non-executive directors of companies listed on stock exchanges
